member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect
member.summary: Reduces the number of unique colors in an image.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Posterize effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PosterizeEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for Posterize effect.
member.remarks: This property is initialized to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect.RedValueCount
member.summary: Specifies how many discrete steps to divide the red channel range of 0.0 to 1.0 into.

remarks.p: For example, a value of 4 generates a table with 4 steps, [0.0, 0.33, 0.67, 1.0].

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect.GreenValueCount
member.summary: Specifies how many discrete steps to divide the green channel range of 0.0 to 1.0 into.

remarks.p: For example, a value of 4 generates a table with 4 steps, [0.0, 0.33, 0.67, 1.0].

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.PosterizeEffect.BlueValueCount
member.summary: Specifies how many discrete steps to divide the blue channel range of 0.0 to 1.0 into.

remarks.p: For example, a value of 4 generates a table with 4 steps, [0.0, 0.33, 0.67, 1.0].
